SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: IF &$PLATFORM# EQ "WINDOWS" @echo off SET ERROR=0 : ELSE error=0 : ENDIF
: DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
!------------------------------------------ LOGGING INPUT PARAMETERS -------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
! Selenium server path : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Selenium server path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_SLM_SERVER_FILE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Test suite file : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Test suite file" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_SLM_SUITE_FILE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Test result file : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Test result file" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_SLM_RESULT_FILE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! AUT Url : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "AUT Url" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_SLM_AUT_URL#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Browser : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Browser" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_SLM_BROWSER#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Advanced options : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Advanced options" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_SLM_OPTIONS#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! logging start of execution : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!------------------------------------ Validation of files -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
!----------------- Selenium server path validation----------------------------- ! check if the file is a jar : SET &CHECK_EXTENSION# = STR_ENDS_WITH(&UC4RB_SLM_SERVER_FILE#, ".jar") : IF &CHECK_EXTENSION# EQ "Y" ! check if the file path is valid : SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SLM_SERVER_FILE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_FILE_EXISTS : ELSE : STOP MSG, 51, "Invalid file type [&UC4RB_SLM_SERVER_FILE#]" : ENDIF
! ----------------- Test suite file validation-------------------------------- ! check if the file is html, htm or xhtml : SET &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# = &UC4RB_SLM_SUITE_FILE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SELENIUM.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_EXTENSION_HTML
! check if the file path is valid : SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SLM_SUITE_FILE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_FILE_EXISTS
! ----------------- Test result file validation--------------------------------- : IF &UC4RB_SLM_RESULT_FILE# = "" ! getting the temp directory of agent : SET &AGENT_TEMPDIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) : PSET &RESULT_TEMPFILE# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_TEMPDIR#,'testresult-&$RUNID#.html') : ELSE : PSET &RESULT_TEMPFILE# = &UC4RB_SLM_RESULT_FILE# : ENDIF
! check if the file is html, htm or xhtml : SET &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# = &RESULT_TEMPFILE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SELENIUM.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_EXTENSION_HTML
! getting the directory where the result file should be created : SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" : SET &POS# = STR_FIND_REVERSE(&RESULT_TEMPFILE#,"\") : CASE "UNIX" : SET &POS# = STR_FIND_REVERSE(&RESULT_TEMPFILE#,"/") : ENDSWITCH : IF &POS# GT 0 : SET &LEN# = STR_LENGTH(&RESULT_TEMPFILE#) : SET &POS# = &POS# - 1 : SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = STR_CUT(&RESULT_TEMPFILE#,1,&POS#) ! check if the file path is valid : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_DIR_EXISTS : ELSE : STOP MSG, 51, "Invalid directory [&RESULT_TEMPFILE#]" : ENDIF
! delete the file if it already exists : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &RESULT_TEMPFILE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SELENIUM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &TEST_RESULT_FILE# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
: SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" IF EXIST &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# ( del -Force &RESULT_TEMPFILE# ) : CASE "UNIX" if [ -f &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# ] then rm -f &RESULT_TEMPFILE# fi : ENDSWITCH
!---------------------------------- Creating command to execute test suite ------------------------------
! preparing command to run a test suite : SET &UC4RB_SLM_RUN_CMD# = "java -jar"
! Selenium server path : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SLM_SERVER_FILE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SELENIUM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_SLM_RUN_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SLM_RUN_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Browser : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SLM_BROWSER# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SELENIUM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_SLM_RUN_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SLM_RUN_CMD#, " -htmlSuite &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! AUT Url : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SLM_AUT_URL# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SELENIUM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_SLM_RUN_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SLM_RUN_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Test suite file, test result file, advanced options : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SLM_SUITE_FILE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SELENIUM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_SLM_RUN_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SLM_RUN_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# &TEST_RESULT_FILE# &UC4RB_SLM_OPTIONS#")
: SET &LOGGING_COMMAND# = '&UC4RB_SLM_RUN_CMD#' : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SELENIUM.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_COMMAND &UC4RB_SLM_RUN_CMD#
! check error and if the result file exist : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" SET ERROR=%ERRORLEVEL% IF NOT EXIST &TEST_RESULT_FILE# ( SET ERROR=1 ) : ELSE error=$? if [ ! -f &TEST_RESULT_FILE# ] then error=1 fi : ENDIF
!-------------------------------------------ERROR MESSAGE-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** RUN TEST SUITE ACTION FAILED ********" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SELENIUM.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMD_RETCODE@GENERIC
!-------------------------------------------SUCCESS MESSAGE------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** RUN TEST SUITE ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: ! Publishing output file path in case of success :PSET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :IF &STATUS# = 0 : SET &UC4RB_SLM_RESULT_FILE_PATH# = &RESULT_TEMPFILE# : PUBLISH &UC4RB_SLM_RESULT_FILE_PATH#,,"WORKFLOW" ! Publishing total no. of cases, successful cases and failure cases : SET &UC4RB_SLM_FILE_PATH# = &RESULT_TEMPFILE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SELENIUM.PUB.INCLUDE.READ_FILE : SET &UC4RB_SLM_CONTENT# = &UC4RB_SLM_FILE_CONTENT# ! get total number of test cases executed : SET &UC4RB_SLM_NODE# = "numTestTotal:" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SELENIUM.PUB.INCLUDE.PARSE_RESULT : SET &UC4RB_SLM_TOTAL_TEST_CASES# = &UC4RB_SLM_VALUE# : PUBLISH &UC4RB_SLM_TOTAL_TEST_CASES#,,"WORKFLOW" ! get total number of cases that has passed : SET &UC4RB_SLM_NODE# = "numTestPasses:" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SELENIUM.PUB.INCLUDE.PARSE_RESULT : SET &UC4RB_SLM_PASSED_CASES# = &UC4RB_SLM_VALUE# : PUBLISH &UC4RB_SLM_PASSED_CASES#,,"WORKFLOW" ! get total number of cases that has failed : SET &UC4RB_SLM_NODE# = "numTestFailures:" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SELENIUM.PUB.INCLUDE.PARSE_RESULT : SET &UC4RB_SLM_FAILED_CASES# = &UC4RB_SLM_VALUE# : PUBLISH &UC4RB_SLM_FAILED_CASES#,,"WORKFLOW" :ELSE : PSET &UC4RB_SLM_RESULT_FILE_PATH# = "" : PSET &UC4RB_SLM_TOTAL_TEST_CASES# ="" : PSET &UC4RB_SLM_PASSED_CASES# ="" : PSET &UC4RB_SLM_FAILED_CASES# ="" :ENDIF
